definitions.definition: ( transitive , also figuratively ) To make (an animal or person ) unconscious or cause (an animal or person) death by preventing breathing ; to smother , to suffocate .
( transitive , hyperbolic ) To cause (someone) difficulty in breathing, or a choking or gagging feeling .
examples: The heat was stifling the children.

definitions.definition: ( transitive , also figuratively ) To prevent (a breath , cough , or cry , or the voice , etc.) from being released from the throat .
( transitive ) To make (something) unable to be heard by blocking it with some medium .

subdefinitions.definition: ( transitive ) To keep in, hold back , or repress (something).
( transitive ) To prevent (something) from being revealed ; to conceal , to hide , to suppress .

definitions.definition: ( transitive , agriculture ( sericulture ) ) To treat (a silkworm cocoon ) with steam as part of the process of silk production .

examples: Two firemen tragically stifled in yesterday’s fire when trying to rescue an old lady from her bedroom.

definitions.definition: ( intransitive , hyperbolic ) To smother; to make breathing difficult .

main_definition: ( transitive , also figuratively ) To make (an animal or person ) unconscious or cause (an animal or person) death by preventing breathing ; to smother , to suffocate .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , hyperbolic ) To cause (someone) difficulty in breathing, or a choking or gagging feeling .
( transitive , also figuratively ) To prevent (a breath , cough , or cry , or the voice , etc.) from being released from the throat .
( transitive ) To make (something) unable to be heard by blocking it with some medium .
( transitive , agriculture ( sericulture ) ) To treat (a silkworm cocoon ) with steam as part of the process of silk production .
( intransitive , hyperbolic ) To smother; to make breathing difficult .

definitions.definition: To cause (a dog , horse , or other four-legged mammal ) to dislocate or sprain its stifle joint .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To cause (a dog , horse , or other four-legged mammal ) to dislocate or sprain its stifle joint .
